name: Cube Runner (itch) (CritAnnihilation)
description:
==== Cube Runner ====

Hi, my name is William or CritAnnihilation and I am an indie game developer from America who as of early 2021 has started to develop games as a hobby. My main passion that I want to grow as I learn more about game development is how to tell a compelling story through the wide-open canvas that is a video game.

This first little, prototype, game, thingy that I threw together in a few days, with the help of a tutorial I must admit, is my first attempt to create a fun 3D based game.

The engine that I used was Unity and the programming language that it was coded in was C#.

The gameplay is very basic, an endless running cube dodging and jumping over obstacles, but remember that this is my first ever project in the Unity game engine.

There may very well be some jank in the small sample size of levels that I made, but all suggestions on how I can improve upon it would be greatly appreciated.

In the future I hope to diversify my game portfolio and who knows, maybe make the next "Cry of Fear" or "Undertale." A long shot, probably, but I can dream, can't I?

In any case, enjoy the game.

Take care and have fun!
